title: Game Progress Route
content:
hem. My hands are full. Ask someone else. Excellent. I can add Philomeen's head to my collection.

If you select the first option, Larrida will beg you not to harm Philomeen. Now, head North East until you reach 2 Duerger at (X:-626 Y:351) and listen to their conversation. They'll approach you, suspecting you're a True Soul, and demand repayment. Respond with:

Why would you think I'm a True Soul? You want my gold? Fight me for it. I don't support those True Soul cultists. I want Nere out - you
